strapiPost.title: Ten NWA Entrepreneurs Begin Three Month Accelerator Program
strapiPost.content:
Ten Northwest Arkansas entrepreneurs are entering a new cohort as a part of a three-month national idea accelerator program starting today. 

  • Innovators: The program is a part of the Heartland Forward initiative to put ideas into action in the mid-United States and is happening through a partnership with Builders + Backers. NWA participants will join individuals from nine other heartland cities to become "Builders." 
  • Making change: Ideas include an app to help women track and manage IVF treatments, a new podcasting solution for enterprise businesses, software designed to improve farming processes, a solution for converting regular bikes into electronic bikes, and much more. 

Read more HERE.
